titleStmt.title: An exact description of the famous cittie of Bristoll and suburbs thereof composed by a scale and tchnographically [sic] described by I.M. 1671.
titleStmt.author: Individuell människohjälp (Organization)
Millerd, Ia.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for ye author & sold by Mr. Tho. Wall bookseller in Bristoll,
